description:
Motor vehicle accidents happen every day, but that does not make them any less devastating for victims and their families. At Anastopoulo Law Firm in Columbia, South Carolina, we understand how a single act of negligence by one driver can result in months, years or a lifetime of physical pain, emotional distress and financial turmoil for another. If another person's carelessness turned yours or a loved one's life upside down, our personal injury attorneys will use our experience and resources to help you recover the maximum amount of compensation for your injuries and, in the process, the justice you deserve.

Our law firm practices exclusively in personal injury law. In doing so, we can confidently say that we dedicate the full breadth of our resources to upholding justice for victims and their families. As a result, we routinely recover six-figure and seven-figure verdicts for individuals who experienced the following:

  • Medical malpractice
  • Birth injury
  • Brain injury
  • Premises liability
  • Products liability
  • Animal bites
  • Trucking accidents
  • Workers' compensation
  • Wrongful death

The team at Anastopoulo Law Firm begins each attorney-client relationship with a free initial consultation. During this first meeting, we will discuss the details of your case and devise a legal strategy that can best help you recover from your losses and rebuild your life. For more than 25 years, our team has helped other injured people do just that. In fact, we proudly boast several of the state's largest personal injury outcomes, many of which include million and multimillion-dollar jury verdicts and settlements.

Our team commits to providing each client with the thorough, compassionate and comprehensive representation they need during trying times. We manage all aspects of a case, meet clients where they are at - including in the hospital - and work on a contingency fee basis.
